teaser: From Cairo, a businessman's view of Egypt's new chapter. Today the American flag flying over the U.S. Capitol in Washington will be made of hemp. And Detroit answers our question: How do you know when you are wealthy?
byline: Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Sarah Cwiek, Karen Clark, Bruce Johnson, David Brancaccio, Kim Adams and Brian Bull
description: From Cairo, a businessman's view of Egypt's new chapter. Today the American flag flying over the U.S. Capitol in Washington will be made of hemp. And Detroit answers our question: How do you know when you are wealthy?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, July 4, 2013
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, July 4, 2013
